text: Killing Is My Business... and Business Is Good! is the first studio album by American thrash metal band Megadeth. The album was released on June 12, 1985. It was released by Combat Records. In early 1985, the band was given $8,000 by Combat Records. The band was given this money to record and produce their first album. Later, the band was given another $4,000. Most of the money was spent on drugs, alcohol, and food. Megadeth fired their producer, and produced the record by themselves. A new version of the album was made in 2018. It was named Killing Is My Business... and Business Is Good! - The Final Kill. == Track Listing == ==References== Category:1984 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Heavy metal albums Category:Megadeth albums
title: Killing Is My Business... and Business Is Good!
